charges.charge_description: Transporting  undocumented aliens within the U.S. Penalty: not more than 10 Yrs. And/or $250,000.00, $100 cvf, 3 Yrs TSR.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: 3 yrs probation [the deft is placed in home dentention the first 6 months of probation]; the deft is to be gainfully employed or enrolled in a higher education program full-time; drug aftercare; mental health care; the deft is not to handle firearms and there shall be no assocation with felons; no fine [with the condition that the deft will remain in school or continue to be gainfully employed]; $100.00 Special Assessment; the deft waived the appeal as part of the written plea agreement, however, the deft is advised of her right to appeal if she believes the waiver is not valid

charges.charge_description: Conspiracy to transport undocumented aliens within the U.S. Penalty: Not more than 5 Yrs. and/or $250,000.00, $100 cvf ea ct., 3 Yrs TSR.(1)
Transporting  undocumented aliens within the U.S. Penalty: not more than 10 Yrs. And/or $250,000.00, $100 cvf, 3 Yrs TSR.(3)
